category.name: Integration.TCAA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAA123_extobject_file_rename
preference.preference_description: Controls whether file names of attached reference links are to be retained as the original ones or have to be renamed during save to Teamcenter. Possible values: 0 - do not rename attached reference link file on save 1 - rename attached reference link files automatically 2 - rename attached reference link files automatically only during Save As New Item operations (Default)
